last_episode_to_air.name: The Stolen Baby
last_episode_to_air.overview: Four teams are sent to track down a man alleged to have taken a baby girl from her family, but the suspect may have an unexpected accomplice.

name: Crime Stories: India Detectives
overview: With unprecedented access to the Bengaluru City Police, this gripping series follows major criminal investigations from the moment the crime is reported through to the capture of the suspects. From murder to kidnap to extortion, each film tracks a shocking and compelling case in the heart of India's Silicon Valley. Filmed with senior officers at home and at work, this is a unique window into the lives of Bengaluru's police officers as they attempt to detect the most complex and serious crimes in the city.

episodes.name: A Murdered Mother
episodes.overview: When a stabbing incident kills a mother and leaves her son gravely injured, Bengaluru police trace the steps and the motives of their unusual suspect.

episodes.name: Body In a Bag
episodes.overview: A murdered body is found in a sack, but without clear evidence implicating the initial suspects, police seek smaller clues in hopes for a breakthrough.

episodes.name: Dying For Protection
episodes.overview: As sub-inspector Latha Mahesh handles her first murder investigation, findings lead her to reexamine attitudes towards sex workers and their safety.

episodes.name: The Stolen Baby
episodes.overview: Four teams are sent to track down a man alleged to have taken a baby girl from her family, but the suspect may have an unexpected accomplice.
